trans-unit.source: Other Useful Scripting Objects
trans-unit.target: 其他有用的指令碼物件

trans-unit.source: powershell,cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell,cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Other Useful Scripting Objects
trans-unit.target: 其他有用的指令碼物件

trans-unit.source: The following objects provide additional scripting functionality in Windows PowerShell ISE.
trans-unit.target: 下列物件會提供 Windows PowerShell ISE 中額外的指令碼功能。

trans-unit.source: They are not part of the **$psISE** hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 它們不屬於 **$psISE** 階層。

trans-unit.source: Useful Scripting objects
trans-unit.target: 有用的指令碼物件

trans-unit.source: $psUnsupportedConsoleApplications
trans-unit.target: $psUnsupportedConsoleApplications

trans-unit.source: There are some limitations on how Windows PowerShell ISE interacts with console applications.
trans-unit.target: 有一些關於 Windows PowerShell ISE 與主控台應用程式互動方式的限制。

trans-unit.source: A command or an automation script that requires user intervention might not work the way it works from the Windows PowerShell console.
trans-unit.target: 需要使用者介入的命令或自動化指令碼，可能無法依照它從 Windows PowerShell 主控台運作的方式來運作。

trans-unit.source: You might want to block these commands or scripts from running in the Windows PowerShell ISE Command pane.
trans-unit.target: 您可能想要封鎖這些命令或指令碼在 [Windows PowerShell ISE 命令] 窗格中執行。

trans-unit.source: The **$psUnsupportedConsoleApplications** object keeps a list of such commands.
trans-unit.target: **$psUnsupportedConsoleApplications** 物件會保留這類命令的清單。

trans-unit.source: If you try to run the commands in this list, you get a message that they are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 如果您嘗試執行此清單中的命令，您會收到不支援這類命令的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The following script adds an entry to the list.
trans-unit.target: 下列指令碼會在清單中新增項目。

trans-unit.source: $psLocalHelp
trans-unit.target: $psLocalHelp

trans-unit.source: This is a dictionary object that maintains a context\-sensitive mapping between Help topics and their associated links in the local compiled HTML Help file.
trans-unit.target: 這個字典物件會在本機編譯的 HTML 說明檔中，維護說明主題及其相關聯連結之間內容相關性的對應。

trans-unit.source: It is used to locate the local Help for a particular topic.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用它來尋找特定主題的本機說明。

trans-unit.source: You can add or delete topics from this list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增或刪除此清單中的主題。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows some example key\-value pairs that are contained in **$psLocalHelp**.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範一些 **$psLocalHelp** 中所含的機碼值組範例。

trans-unit.source: Sample Output
trans-unit.target: 取樣輸出

trans-unit.source: Key : Add\-Computer
trans-unit.target: 機碼︰Add\-Computer

trans-unit.source: Value : WindowsPowerShellHelp.chm::\/html\/093f660c\-b8d5\-43cf\-aa0c\-54e5e54e76f9.htm
trans-unit.target: 值：WindowsPowerShellHelp.chm::\/html\/093f660c\-b8d5\-43cf\-aa0c\-54e5e54e76f9.htm

trans-unit.source: Key : Add\-Content
trans-unit.target: 機碼：Add\-Content

trans-unit.source: Value : WindowsPowerShellHelp.chm::\/html\/0c836a1b\-f389\-4e9a\-9325\-0f415686d194.htm
trans-unit.target: 值：WindowsPowerShellHelp.chm::\/html\/0c836a1b\-f389\-4e9a\-9325\-0f415686d194.htm

trans-unit.source: The following script adds an entry to the list.
trans-unit.target: 下列指令碼會在清單中新增項目。

trans-unit.source: $psOnlineHelp
trans-unit.target: $psOnlineHelp

trans-unit.source: This is a dictionary object that maintains a context\-sensitive mapping between topic titles of Help topics and their associated external URLs.
trans-unit.target: 這個字典物件會維護說明主題的主題標題及其相關聯外部 URL 之間內容相關性的對應。

trans-unit.source: It is used to locate the Help for a particular topic on the web.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用它，在 Web 上尋找特定主題的說明。

trans-unit.source: You can add or delete topics from this list.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增或刪除此清單中的主題。

trans-unit.source: Sample Output
trans-unit.target: 取樣輸出

trans-unit.source: Key : Add\-Computer
trans-unit.target: 機碼︰Add\-Computer

trans-unit.source: Value : http:\/\/go.microsoft.com\/fwlink\/p\/?LinkID\=135194
trans-unit.target: 值：http:\/\/go.microsoft.com\/fwlink\/p\/?LinkID\=135194

trans-unit.source: Key : Add\-Content
trans-unit.target: 機碼：Add\-Content

trans-unit.source: Value : http:\/\/go.microsoft.com\/fwlink\/p\/?LinkID\=113278
trans-unit.target: 值：http:\/\/go.microsoft.com\/fwlink\/p\/?LinkID\=113278

trans-unit.source: The following script adds an entry to the list.
trans-unit.target: 下列指令碼會在清單中新增項目。

trans-unit.source: See Also
trans-unit.target: 另請參閱

trans-unit.source: The Windows PowerShell ISE Scripting Object Model
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell ISE 指令碼物件模型
